# No translation for this page

The page that you wish to see is available in French only.

In accordance with the [SAAQ’s language policy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/language-policy), texts and documents intended for SAAQ employees and Québec businesses are only available in French.

[You may consult the French version of the page.](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/controle-routier-quebec/mandataires-verification-vehicules-routiers)

Last update: January 27, 2016

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That’s why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.
